import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'], }) export class HeaderComponent { pageslist = ['SHOP', 'COLLECTIVE', 'DESIGNERS', 'ABOUT US', 'CONTACT US']; }
